column1: Read the Engineering Notebook and all pages of the Team Meeting Guide
Ensure you have received all materials needed to implement the program
Make sure you have a Bluetooth-enabled device with the SPIKE App installed
Identify the meeting space and how materials will be stored between sessions
Decide how often the team will meet and communicate the schedule with families
Think about the festival event and register if needed; share the date with families
Unpack the SPIKE Essential set, sort LEGO elements, update and charge the hub
Explore the FIRST Core Values with the team
Familiarize yourself with the Explore Set and watch season videos on YouTube
Browse the Explore Season Resources page and Multimedia Resources list
Complete Tutorial Activities in the SPIKE App for practice before sessions
